title.native: 歌舞伎町シャーロック

description:
The East Side of Shinjuku Ward … In the center of this chaotic neighborhood, the neon-lit Kabukicho district is expanding. Where light shines, there are also deep shadows. The curtain rises on this night stage where bizarre murders occurred! Is this suspense? No, comedy? An indistinguishable drama is about to begin….

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Rakugo
tags.description: Rakugo is the traditional Japanese performance art of comic storytelling.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Classic Literature
tags.description: Discusses or adapts a work of classic world literature.

tags.name: Bar
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.
